attributes.action: Regulate all bus services across Greater Manchester by December 2019.
attributes.background: Currently the bus services in Greater Manchester are not regulated and offer a unreliable services and reduced routes. Please adopt the similar approach to London by having regulation that has standard capped fairs and one ticket type across the multiple bus franchises by December 2019 or earlier.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for the Mayor of Greater Manchester and Transport for Greater Manchester and not the UK Government and Parliament.

You can find out more about their current proposals here:

https://tfgm.com/future-travel/bus-reform
